title: 2112 SOLSTICE TEE
desc: Rush’s 1976 album, 2112, the greatest concept album of all time. That’s just our humble opinion of course.
features: Printed on 100% cotton Gildan SoftStyle.

title: ROLL THE BONES KICKMAN TEE
desc: Not every tee has to be black, right?
features: Printed on Carolina Blue, 100% cotton Gildan SoftStyle.

title: ROLL THE BONES KICKMAN HOODY
desc: Stylish Roll The Bones design on a heavyweight hoody.
features: Printed on Gunmetal Heather, 80/20 cotton/poly Independent Trading Style 4000. For exact sizing, please search style name and number.

title: SIGNALS 40 RAGLAN
desc: A celebratory raglan for the 40th Anniversary of the album, Signals.
features: The 80’s brings back a lot of great memories for music, fashion, hairstyles.
Some of those we’re holding onto, some not.
90% ringspun cotton, 10% polyester.
For exact sizing, search Tultex style #245

title: RUSH 1974 BOMBER JACKET
desc: A lightweight Rush Bomber for spring.
features: 100% polyester, single layer, with interior water resistant coating.
Pockets on the side.
For exact sizing, please see attached size chart.

title: COUNTERPARTS PATCH LONGSLEEVE
desc: This is the original design from way back on the Counterparts Tour.
features: A 100% cotton longsleeve, with a woven patch with the nut & bolt, and RUSH embroidered above.
Printed on 100% cotton Next Level Apparel.

title: R40 WASHED TRI-LOGO HOODY
desc: This artwork is from the Neil Peart stage tees collection, from the R40 Tour.
features: Printed on the front, and sleeve.
This is printed on a soft-washed, ring spun, 80/20 cotton/poly hoody from Comfort Colors.
This is garment-dyed, which means it has that lived-in, washed-out feel.

title: RUSH LUXURY BATHROBE
desc: Decadent Turkish cotton bathrobe for lounging around the house.
features: Embroidered skull logo on the front chest, and embroidered RUSH 1974 on the hood.
Two side pockets, belt with loops, and custom Rush labels inside also.
This robe comes in two sizes, and we recommend the larger size for anyone over 5’9” in height.
100% Turkish Cotton Terry.

title: AFTK 40TH KINGS HOODY
desc: The Kings Hoody is one of the all time, longest-standing designs Rush has had in the product line.
features: A classic design from A Farewell To Kings, with this issue being a 40th Anniversary version.
Printed on the front and back, and an embroidered Starman on the front near the pocket.
Fabric is cotton/poly blend.

title: NAVY STENCIL STARMAN TEE
desc: The Starman is looking good on this navy blue tee.
features: This tee is printed on 100% cotton Gildan SoftStyle or similar.
